website_summaries.verdict: This premier edition of Barricade takes some serious transforming skills, but has some great details as it transforms from robot to police car.
pros: Includes good paint details, especially on the face and upper body
cons: Transforming is made more difficult because pieces sometimes don't lock in place well

customer_reviews.title: Breaks away at the joints
customer_reviews.text: The hood constantly comes off, can't glye the hinge together or it won't transform. The elbows have to sit atoo the hip joints, but it's not in the instructions to lift up the legs THEN put the arms up. The feetdon't click together like it says, it almost broke when we tried. All together, its a cheaply made toy more suited for collection in a dusty box in a.m attic, than for actually using. A waste of my kids' allowance, and i'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy! Not Quality parts though.
customer_reviews.text: My kid was so excited for this and honestly, it's a pretty cool transformer but the biggest problem was the Quality of parts. The roof of the car is an important piece but did not stay on. It's like the ball joint on it was too thin and made it keep falling off. They really don't make them the way they used to. Parts are made from more brittle plastic and things just don't hold up all that well. Honestly, If your kid is like 8 or older, this is probably a fun toy... but for us, it just wasn't great. The seller was great to work with though with returns.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan R.

customer_reviews.title: This was a great model. The painting
customer_reviews.text: This was a great model. The painting, though, especially on the eyes, were not the best. However, it could be worse. The height is about 5 1/2 inches when the transformer is standing upright. HTH
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Epic
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great about it, no problems at all 😁
customer_reviews.author: Kim Layden

customer_reviews.title: Bad guy but
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know this was a bad guy and my grandson was a little disappointed about it when he for this toy. After explaining that the food guys can’t be the hero’s without ah king a bad guy to fight he decided he needed some bad guys too.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: The backpacks a bit big but not terrible, and the weapons can store on the leg ...
customer_reviews.text: Adult collector. Its technically a shellformer but theres enough involved to make the transformation interesting. The backpacks a bit big but not terrible, and the weapons can store on the leg and be left on in both modes
customer_reviews.author: Mistersouji

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but very hard to transform
customer_reviews.text: This made my son very happen when he received this as a Christmas gift this year. It looks great and it is a great product for the price, but it is difficult to transform. Even my husband, who is very good at following directions and transforming these things, had a hard time making it work. He eventually got it, but we would recommend this for an older boy.
customer_reviews.author: Randi Fast

customer_reviews.title: too hard to transform
customer_reviews.text: It looks kinda cool, but its too hard to transform because of the arms...
customer_reviews.author: Tofu Minx

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be of good quality...so far.
customer_reviews.text: My nephew was very happy to receive this for his 12th birthday. A little difficult to transform, but he YouTubed it and had it down after that.
customer_reviews.author: T. RYAN

customer_reviews.title: Barricade's a Blast!
customer_reviews.text: Our son enjoyed the vehicle mode, the weapon attachments, and the overall transformation process between modes. He has played with it on a regular basis since receiving it, and it has remained durable.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: COOL TRANSFORMER
customer_reviews.text: MY SON LOVES THIS TRANSFORMER BUT THEY DUE BREAK EASILY, I WOULD NEED TO HELP HIM TRANSFORM IT BACK TO A CAR, IT'S A LITTLE DIFFICULT FOR A 4 YEAR OLD TO FIGURE OUT
customer_reviews.author: Hugo

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design and cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst of all transformer toys. It takes an engineer to make it into a car, every piece snaps off so easily, and it doesn’t do anything cool. I’m cursing myself already for buying this toy, and it’s been open 1 hour. I have put the thing back together at least 28 times now. A kids toy shouldn’t break this easily.
customer_reviews.author: Doug R Ingalls

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Unnecessarily complicated. Eight pages of instructions to learn how to "transform". Keep shopping.
customer_reviews.author: DBK

customer_reviews.title: Best transformer in D line
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best transformer, I just love it, spunky and stronger aspect design for barricade. I had a ss28 barricade and I still prefer this one. Transformation is way too smoother. Also this one is great for repaint, gonna do it asap
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: This toy is extremely hard to transform. I bought it for my 4 year old son and had to finally put it away for him to play with when he’s older, because I am afraid it will break as he forces it to transform.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Baker

customer_reviews.title: Good toy.
customer_reviews.text: Hes not bad . Realy fun to pose little hard to get the gun on his arm but hes got a nice look,easy to transform,nice looking car,& realy fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Western stars

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Look way bigger in the photo than it really is. It’s a little bigger than my hand!
customer_reviews.author: Christina karcher

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool
customer_reviews.text: To cheap. It’s a transformer, so I know it’ll be tough to use, but when parts pop off as easy as this one does it’s not near as fun.
customer_reviews.author: Mo Larry Cheese

customer_reviews.title: Made a great Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it. New product. Well made fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Kats

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic and doesnt transform
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy and cheap plastic and sadly does not transform.
customer_reviews.author: Fox_1

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This item was apparently broken when received. It was a Christmas gift for my grandson & he never got to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Moore

customer_reviews.title: Really cheap made
customer_reviews.text: Really cheap made, every part is easy to fall off, after transform everywhere is gap.
customer_reviews.author: Shenshen H.

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but I think the previous version had better details, however it looks well done.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Florez

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT transform
customer_reviews.text: After having SEVERAL high school age kids work on this..... we have decided this does NOT transform. Impossible ! Not worth the money at ALL.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel C.

customer_reviews.title: but still one of the better figures of this line
customer_reviews.text: loose joints all around, but still one of the better figures of this line.
customer_reviews.author: Sid Signa

customer_reviews.title: He love this one and the price was right
customer_reviews.text: My son collect transformers. He love this one and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Everything was fine besides the fact that the drivers side front fender won’t tab in and keeps slipping out
customer_reviews.author: Pj

customer_reviews.title: looks good, but very hard to transform
customer_reviews.text: looks good, but very hard to transform, too meny steps. My 4 year old son can't do it by himself
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap product, doesn’t work well, parts fall off super easy. I’d pay a couple bucks for this at most. Not worth the money. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: kara

customer_reviews.title: BREAKS A LOT!!!  TO DELICATE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Breaks easily and very delicate. I have a 9 year old that keeps freaking out every time a piece breaks off.
customer_reviews.author: TAB

customer_reviews.title: Easily Broken
customer_reviews.text: Even for older kids this broke easily. Not really meant to transform. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it, although he thought it was a bit on the small side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New transformers
customer_reviews.text: Because one of those doors can't be losing off and I want another one
customer_reviews.author: Joker Darius

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great molding with fun accessories and good posability, however the hips were extremely loose upon opening.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella Justice

customer_reviews.title: Too Difficult To Transform - For Kids Or Adults
customer_reviews.text: My 4.5 year old (yes I understand he's younger than "8 and up") had been begging me for this toy. We got it and I couldn't figure out how to transform it. It took my husband over 30 minutes to figure it out. My son is so upset that he can't do it. Bottom line: Very hard to transform for anyone, but especially little kids
customer_reviews.author: Leon R.

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy. It is plastic
customer_reviews.text: Cool toy. It is plastic. I found it kind of difficult to transform it. I imagine younger children would find it very difficult to transform it.
customer_reviews.author: BJS777

customer_reviews.title: Good quality item but I can't even figure it out ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality item but I can't even figure it out myself for my son. My husband is able to and says it is like the original transformation from the one he use to have as a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: it actually became fun when I learned it
customer_reviews.text: A bit complicated to transform but after going on youtube to learn how, it actually became fun when I learned it
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: I know he will love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my grandson. I know he will love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Thorpe

customer_reviews.title: This toy was a complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the other transformers we have from the same line, the parts most likely to break do NOT pop off and re-attach. Instead they just break. This is a photo of the toy 15 min after my son opened it and transformed it the first time. This toy was a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Becky from Tampa

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money on this
customer_reviews.text: I'm 10 years old and I saved up all of my money to buy this toy. It's junk and it falls apart, the roof comes off in the front and doesn't go back on. It's worthless, don't waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap crap that falls apart immediately
customer_reviews.text: Cheap crap that barely was functional from the beginning. My grandson cried because I was going to return it because it never closed up like it was supposed to, so rather than completely break his heart, I let him keep it. Then one side promptly broke and fell off. I suggest you spend your $20 on something else because this is garbage. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: cd9963

customer_reviews.title: OVERPRICED!!
customer_reviews.text: My son purchased this police transformer for $24.95. He loves it and was super proud he earned the money to purchase it himself, but two days after we opened it we found the exact say one at Walmart for $14.95.
customer_reviews.author: nicole irish

customer_reviews.title: ARE YOU USERNAME LADIESMAN217?!
customer_reviews.text: I love it because he knows how to punish and enslave

customer_reviews.title: Not worth its money
customer_reviews.text: Not a high quality toy, my 6 yo son had real problems to transform it, but usually he is super proud with them . And plastic is not good.
customer_reviews.author: Jane K.

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst movie figure collection ever
customer_reviews.text: Cheap hasbro figure. Light, lots of kibble, cheap design and then the nerve to call this "premium "! This is the worst movie figure collection ever. Hasbro has sold out and they only want your money. It did come on time so amazon was great as usual , but donot buy this cheap crap from hasbro. $20?! Someone should swing for this
customer_reviews.author: William Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My favorite decepticon and its really good quality. Goes great with collection.

product_meta.title: Transformers: The Last Knight Premier Edition Deluxe Barricade
product_meta.description:
The explosive Transformers saga continues with Transformers: The Last Knight. With the fate of Earth at stake, new heroes must rise in an epic struggle to forge a future for all. The Transformers: The Last Knight Premier Edition Deluxe lineup features highly articulated, 5.5-inch-scale figures designed with eye-catching detail. This Premier Edition features fan favorite characters from Transformers: The Last Knight, so fans can join in the epic Transformers action. Barricade is a master of deception with one focus -- destroy all Autobots. He enjoys tricking his enemies into believing they are safe, only to turn on them when they least expect it. As a chaotic battle erupts, Barricade is a sinister force lurking at every turn. Figure Specs: Premier Edition Deluxe Decepticon Barricade figure Modes: robot, police car 11-step conversion Transformers and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Welcome to the incredible world of Transformers robots. It is a world of high technology, ancient history, and a battle that has spanned the entire galaxy and millions of years. Optimus Prime, leader of the heroic Autobots, battles the tyrant Megatron and his evil Deceptions for the fate of freedom across the universe. There's a Transformers figure for every kid or collector. From big converting action figures to miniature battling robots to figures that change between modes in 1 step, you can team up with Transformers toys to create your own incredible adventures. Whether you're defending Earth with the Autobots, or conquering space with the Deceptions, the action is up to you. Transformers is a world-famous entertainment brand with 30 years of history, blockbuster movies, hit television shows and countless novels and comic books. With Transformers robot toys, you can create your own chapters in this epic, ongoing story. Transformers and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro. This copy is intended as placeholder text only and is not representative of individual items in the line.
feature_bullets: Converts between robot and police car modes
Includes Transformers: The Last Knight Premier Edition Deluxe Barricade figure, 3 accessories, and instructions.
